beans.description:
A convenient aggregating config file for running the jobs in this project from the command line instead of from the web application. E.g.
$ MAVEN_OPTS="-Dbatch.jdbc.url=jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9005/samples -Dbatch.data.source.init=false" \ mvn exec:java -Dexec.classpathScope=runtime \ -Dexec.mainClass=org.springframework.batch.core.launch.support.CommandLineJobRunner \ -Dexec.args="classpath:launch-context.xml job1 fail=false run.id=1"
